definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: net (as something perforated; cf. Ar. muxar=amun perforated work, Fl in NHWB:ii, 208; NH [[חֵרֶם]] net; Ph. [[חרם]] maker of nets)—abs. ´[[ח]] Mic 7:2; sf. [[חֶרְמִי]] Ez Eze 32:3, [[חֶרְמוֹ]] Hb Hab 1:15, Hab 1:16, Hab 1:17; pl. [[חֲרָמִים]] Ec 7:26, Ez Eze 26:5, Eze 26:14, Eze 47:10; —hunter's net Mic 7:2, Ec 7:26; fisherman's net Ez Eze 26:5, Eze 26:14, Eze 32:3, Eze 47:10, Hb Hab 1:15, Hab 1:16, Hab 1:17.
